member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.AssemblyMarker
member.summary: Marker class for the Persistence layer assembly. This layer contains EF Core DbContext, repositories, migrations, and configurations.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.CompiledQueries
member.summary: Pre-compiled EF Core queries for frequently-executed operations. Eliminates expression-tree compilation overhead on every call. Phase C.3 — Performance Hardening.

member.name: F:MarcoERP.Persistence.CompiledQueries.GetAccountByCode
member.summary: Retrieves a single Account by its unique AccountCode. Used by chart-of-accounts lookups and journal posting validation.

member.name: F:MarcoERP.Persistence.CompiledQueries.GetActiveFiscalYear
member.summary: Retrieves the currently-active FiscalYear (Status == Active). At most one fiscal year is active at any time (FY-INV-03).

member.name: F:MarcoERP.Persistence.CompiledQueries.GetProductByCode
member.summary: Retrieves a Product by its unique Code (with base unit eagerly loaded). Used by invoice line entry and product search.

member.name: F:MarcoERP.Persistence.CompiledQueries.GetProductByBarcode
member.summary: Retrieves a Product by Barcode (with base unit eagerly loaded). Used by POS barcode scanning and quick search.

member.name: F:MarcoERP.Persistence.CompiledQueries.GetWarehouseProduct
member.summary: Retrieves a WarehouseProduct stock record by warehouse + product composite key. Used by every inventory movement to read / update stock balance.

member.name: F:MarcoERP.Persistence.CompiledQueries.GetWarehouseProductQuantityBase
member.summary: Retrieves WarehouseProduct.Quantity (base unit) for warehouse + product. Used by Smart Entry (stock display).

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.AccountConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for Account entity. Maps all columns, indexes, relationships, and constraints per design doc Section 1.2.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.AuditLogConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for AuditLog entity. Immutable audit trail — no updates or deletes allowed at domain level. Uses long PK to support high-volume audit records.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.CodeSequenceConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for CodeSequence entity. Ensures one row per document type per fiscal year with concurrency control.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.CompanyConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the Company entity.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.FeatureChangeLogConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the FeatureChangeLog entity. Phase 2: Feature Governance Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.FeatureConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the Feature entity. Phase 2: Feature Governance Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.FeatureVersionConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the FeatureVersion entity. Phase 5: Version & Integrity Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.FiscalPeriodConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for FiscalPeriod entity. Maps all columns, indexes, and constraints per design doc Section 4.2.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.FiscalYearConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for FiscalYear entity. Maps all columns, indexes, relationships per design doc Section 4.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.JournalEntryConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for JournalEntry entity. Maps all columns, indexes, relationships per design doc Section 3.1.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.JournalEntryLineConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for JournalEntryLine entity. Maps all columns, indexes, and constraints per design doc Section 3.2.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.MigrationExecutionConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the MigrationExecution entity. Phase 6: Controlled Migration Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.ProfileFeatureConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the ProfileFeature entity. Phase 3: Progressive Complexity Layer.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.SalesRepresentativeConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core configuration for SalesRepresentative entity.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.SystemProfileConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the SystemProfile entity. Phase 3: Progressive Complexity Layer.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Configurations.SystemVersionConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core Fluent API configuration for the SystemVersion entity. Phase 5: Version & Integrity Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.DesignTimeDbContextFactory
member.summary: Design-time factory for MarcoDbContext. Used by EF Core CLI tools (dotnet ef migrations) when no DI container is available.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Interceptors.AuditSaveChangesInterceptor
member.summary: EF Core SaveChanges interceptor that automatically populates audit fields (CreatedAt, CreatedBy, ModifiedAt, ModifiedBy) on entities inheriting AuditableEntity. AUD-02: Also creates AuditLog records with OldValues/NewValues/ChangedColumns for all Create, Update, and SoftDelete operations per DATABASE_POLICY. Runs inside the same transaction as the business operation (TRX-INT-05).

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Interceptors.AuditSaveChangesInterceptor.ApplyAuditFields(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext)
member.summary: Iterates all tracked entities inheriting AuditableEntity and sets audit timestamps/users.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Interceptors.AuditSaveChangesInterceptor.CaptureAuditEntries(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext)
member.summary: AUD-02: Captures OldValues/NewValues/ChangedColumns before SaveChanges commits. Must be called before save because EF replaces original values after commit.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Interceptors.AuditSaveChangesInterceptor.InsertAuditLogs(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext)
member.summary: Inserts captured AuditLog records after successful SaveChanges. For Added entities, the generated Id is now available.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Interceptors.AuditSaveChangesInterceptor.IsSoftDelete(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.EntityEntry)
member.summary: Detects soft delete by checking if IsDeleted changed to true.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Interceptors.AuditSaveChangesInterceptor.AuditEntry
member.summary: Temporary structure to hold audit data between SavingChanges and SavedChanges.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Interceptors.HardDeleteProtectionInterceptor
member.summary: EF Core interceptor that prevents hard deletion of any entity inheriting SoftDeletableEntity. Enforces RECORD_PROTECTION_POLICY: financial and business records must be soft-deleted only.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.MarcoDbContext
member.summary: Central EF Core DbContext for MarcoERP. Configures all entity mappings via Fluent API (no Data Annotations). Applies global query filters for soft-deleted entities.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.MarcoDbContext.BuildSoftDeleteFilter(System.Type)
member.summary: Builds a lambda expression: entity => !((SoftDeletableEntity)entity).IsDeleted

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.AccountRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IAccountRepository. Global soft-delete filter is applied automatically by MarcoDbContext.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.AuditLogRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IAuditLogRepository. Append-only — no update or delete methods.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.FiscalYearRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IFiscalYearRepository.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.JournalEntryRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IJournalEntryRepository. Global soft-delete filter is applied automatically by MarcoDbContext.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Purchases.PurchaseInvoiceRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IPurchaseInvoiceRepository. PurchaseInvoice is not soft-deletable — only Draft invoices can be hard-deleted.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Purchases.PurchaseInvoiceRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next invoice number in format PI-YYYYMM-####. Example: PI-202602-0001, PI-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Purchases.PurchaseQuotationRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IPurchaseQuotationRepository. PurchaseQuotation is soft-deletable — global query filter applied via DbContext.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Purchases.PurchaseQuotationRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next quotation number in format PQ-YYYYMM-####. Example: PQ-202602-0001, PQ-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Purchases.PurchaseReturnRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IPurchaseReturnRepository. PurchaseReturn is not soft-deletable — only Draft returns can be hard-deleted.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Purchases.PurchaseReturnRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next return number in format PR-YYYYMM-####. Example: PR-202602-0001, PR-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Purchases.SupplierRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ISupplierRepository. Global soft-delete query filter applied by SupplierConfiguration.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.CustomerRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ICustomerRepository. Global soft-delete query filter applied by CustomerConfiguration.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.PosPaymentRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IPosPaymentRepository.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.PosSessionRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IPosSessionRepository.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.SalesInvoiceRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ISalesInvoiceRepository. SalesInvoice is not soft-deletable — only Draft invoices can be hard-deleted.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.SalesInvoiceRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next invoice number in format SI-YYYYMM-####. Example: SI-202602-0001, SI-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.SalesQuotationRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ISalesQuotationRepository. SalesQuotation is soft-deletable — global query filter applied via DbContext.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.SalesQuotationRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next quotation number in format SQ-YYYYMM-####. Example: SQ-202602-0001, SQ-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.SalesRepresentativeRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ISalesRepresentativeRepository. Global soft-delete query filter applied by SalesRepresentativeConfiguration.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.SalesReturnRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ISalesReturnRepository. SalesReturn is not soft-deletable — only Draft returns can be hard-deleted.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Sales.SalesReturnRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next return number in format SR-YYYYMM-####. Example: SR-202602-0001, SR-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Security.RoleRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IRoleRepository.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Security.UserRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IUserRepository.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Settings.FeatureRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IFeatureRepository. Phase 2: Feature Governance Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Settings.ProfileRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IProfileRepository. Phase 3: Progressive Complexity Layer.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Settings.SystemSettingRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ISystemSettingRepository.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Settings.VersionRepository
member.summary: Repository implementation for SystemVersion and FeatureVersion entities. Phase 5: Version & Integrity Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.BankAccountRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IBankAccountRepository. Code format: BNK-####

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.BankAccountRepository.GetNextCodeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next bank account code in format BNK-####. Example: BNK-0001, BNK-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.BankReconciliationRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of IBankReconciliationRepository.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashboxRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ICashboxRepository. Code format: CBX-####

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashboxRepository.GetNextCodeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next cashbox code in format CBX-####. Example: CBX-0001, CBX-0002, ...

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashboxRepository.GetGLBalanceAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: CSH-03: Gets the posted GL balance (Debit − Credit) for the cashbox's linked account. Cash accounts have a Debit natural balance — positive means funds available.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashPaymentRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ICashPaymentRepository. Number format: CP-YYYYMM-####

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashPaymentRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next payment number in format CP-YYYYMM-####. Example: CP-202602-0001, CP-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashReceiptRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ICashReceiptRepository. Number format: CR-YYYYMM-####

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashReceiptRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next receipt number in format CR-YYYYMM-####. Example: CR-202602-0001, CR-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashTransferRepository
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ICashTransferRepository. Number format: CT-YYYYMM-####

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Repositories.Treasury.CashTransferRepository.GetNextNumberAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates the next transfer number in format CT-YYYYMM-####. Example: CT-202602-0001, CT-202602-0002, ...

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.CompanySeed
member.summary: Seeds the default company (Id=1) on first run. Per SYS-03a: The system operates with a single company currently.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.CompanySeed.SeedAsync(MarcoERP.Persistence.MarcoDbContext)
member.summary: Seeds the default company if it does not already exist.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.FeatureSeed
member.summary: Seeds default features for the Feature Governance Engine. Idempotent — skips if features already exist. Phase 2: Feature Governance Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.ProfileSeed
member.summary: Seeds complexity profiles and their feature mappings. Idempotent — skips if profiles already exist. Phase 3: Progressive Complexity Layer.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.SecuritySeed
member.summary: Seeds default roles, permissions, and the admin user. Idempotent — skips if data already exists. Per v1.1: 5 roles (Administrator, Accountant, Sales User, Storekeeper, Viewer).

member.name: F:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.SecuritySeed.AllPermissions
member.summary: All defined permission keys (including governance.access).

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.SecuritySeed.SeedAsync(MarcoERP.Persistence.MarcoDbContext,System.String)
member.summary: Seeds roles, permissions, and default admin user.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.SystemAccountSeed
member.summary: Seeds the Chart of Accounts with system accounts defined in PHASE2_ACCOUNTING_CORE_DESIGN §1.3. SEED-01: Generated on first application run only. SEED-02: Idempotent — checks existence before inserting. SEED-03: All seeded accounts carry IsSystemAccount = true. SEED-04: All seeded accounts carry IsActive = true. SEED-05: Runs inside a transaction — all or nothing. SEED-06: Implemented in Persistence layer (Seeds/ folder).

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.SystemAccountSeed.SeedAsync(MarcoERP.Persistence.MarcoDbContext)
member.summary: Seeds all system accounts if they don't already exist. Inserts level by level (1 → 2 → 3 → 4) so that parent IDs are resolved from the DB. Must be called after database migration.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.SystemAccountSeed.GetAccountDefinitions
member.summary: Returns the flat list of all system account definitions per design doc §1.3. IsParent = true means the account has children and AllowPosting should be false.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.SystemSettingSeed
member.summary: Seeds default system settings per v1.1 Phase 5D. Idempotent — skips if settings already exist.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.UnitSeed
member.summary: Seeds common units of measure. Idempotent — skips existing.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Seeds.VersionSeed
member.summary: Seeds the initial system version and feature-version mappings. Idempotent — skips if versions already exist. Phase 5: Version & Integrity Engine.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.AuditLogService
member.summary: Queries the AuditLogs table for the Audit Log Viewer (D.1). Read-only service — no mutations.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.BackupService
member.summary: Persistence-layer backup service. Executes raw SQL BACKUP/RESTORE commands against SQL Server.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.BackupService.GetDatabaseName
member.summary: Extracts the database name from the connection string.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.CodeGenerator
member.summary: Generates sequential document codes using the CodeSequence table. Supports all document types: JV, SI, PI, CR, CP, CT, SR, PR, IT. SEQ-03: Must run within Serializable isolation (ensured by the calling service).

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.IntegrityService
member.summary: Persistence-layer integrity service. Runs data-quality checks using EF Core LINQ queries against SQL Server.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.JournalNumberGenerator
member.summary: Generates sequential journal numbers using the CodeSequence table. SEQ-03: Must run within Serializable isolation (ensured by the calling service). The caller (JournalEntryService) wraps the posting in a Serializable transaction. This generator reads/increments synchronously per IJournalNumberGenerator contract.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.JournalNumberGenerator.NextNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the next sequential journal number for the given fiscal year. Format: JV-{Year}-{Sequence:D5} (e.g., JV-2026-00001). Creates the CodeSequence row if it doesn't exist.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Reports.ReportService
member.summary: Implementation of IReportService using direct EF Core queries against the MarcoDbContext for efficient aggregation.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.DatabaseBackupService
member.summary: Phase 6: Wraps existing IBackupService for pre-migration backups. Creates backups in a dedicated "Migrations" subfolder.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.GovernanceAuditService
member.summary: Phase 7: Writes governance-specific audit log entries directly to the AuditLogs table. Uses IDateTimeProvider instead of ICurrentUserService (session isolation — 7E).

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.GovernanceIntegrityCheckService
member.summary:
Runs system governance integrity checks. Phase 5: Version & Integrity Engine — read-only validation only.
Checks: 1. Feature registry vs FeatureVersion completeness 2. Enabled features with disabled dependencies 3. CompanyId = null in CompanyAware tables 4. Database version vs Code version 5. High Risk features enabled without FeatureChangeLog 6. Module dependency boundary violations (Phase 8E)

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.MigrationExecutionService
member.summary: Phase 6: Controlled Migration Engine — orchestrates backup → migrate → log. Does NOT replace EF Core; only wraps MigrateAsync with safety and tracking.

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.ModuleDependencyInspector
member.summary: Phase 8D: Reflection-based module dependency inspector. Scans all classes with [Module] attribute, inspects constructor parameters, and validates against . Report-only — never blocks startup.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.ModuleDependencyInspector.BuildInterfaceModuleMap(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.Type})
member.summary: Builds a map from interface types to their module, based on: 1. The implementing class's [Module] attribute 2. Namespace-based heuristic as fallback

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.ModuleDependencyInspector.ResolveModule(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Type,MarcoERP.Domain.Enums.SystemModule})
member.summary: Resolves the SystemModule for a constructor parameter type.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.ModuleDependencyInspector.ResolveModuleByNamespace(System.Type)
member.summary: Heuristic: map namespace segments to SystemModule. Covers repository interfaces, DTOs, validators that don't have [Module] themselves.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.ModuleDependencyInspector.IsCommonInterface(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns true for cross-cutting interfaces that every module may use.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.Services.Settings.ModuleDependencyInspector.ContainsSegment(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if namespace contains a segment (e.g., ".Sales." or ends with ".Sales").

member.name: T:MarcoERP.Persistence.UnitOfWork
member.summary: Unit of Work implementation wrapping MarcoDbContext.SaveChangesAsync. TRX-INT-01: One transaction per use case — SaveChangesAsync may be called multiple times within it. TRX-INT-02: Application layer initiates; Persistence layer (this class) executes.

member.name: M:MarcoERP.Persistence.UnitOfWork.SaveChangesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Commits all pending changes tracked by the DbContext in a single transaction. Returns the number of state entries written to the database. Catches DbUpdateConcurrencyException and wraps it as ConcurrencyConflictException.
